arabic_uthmani: بِسمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحمٰنِ الرَّحيمِ
blank: bismillāhir-raḥmānir-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful

arabic_uthmani: الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: alḥamdulillāhi rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: الرَّحمٰنِ الرَّحيمِ
blank: ar-raḥmānir-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful

arabic_uthmani: مالِكِ يَومِ الدّينِ
blank: māliki yawmid-dīn
english_saheeh_international: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: إِيّاكَ نَعبُدُ وَإِيّاكَ نَستَعينُ
blank: iyyāka naʿbudu wa-iyyāka nastaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: It is You we worship and You we ask for help

arabic_uthmani: اهدِنَا الصِّراطَ المُستَقيمَ
blank: ihdināṣ-ṣirāṭal-mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Guide us to the straight path

arabic_uthmani: صِراطَ الَّذينَ أَنعَمتَ عَلَيهِم غَيرِ المَغضوبِ عَلَيهِم وَلَا الضّالّينَ
blank: ṣirāṭalladhīna ʾanʿamta ʿalayhim ghayril-maghḍūbi ʿalayhim wa-lāḍ-ḍāllīn
english_saheeh_international: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked Your anger or of those who are astray

arabic_uthmani: الم
blank: -l-m (ʾalif lām mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Meem

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ الكِتابُ لا رَيبَ ۛ فيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: dhālikal-kitāb lā rayb fīh hud l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُؤمِنونَ بِالغَيبِ وَيُقيمونَ الصَّلاةَ وَمِمّا رَزَقناهُم يُنفِقونَ
blank: alladhīn yuʾminūn b-l-ghayb w-yuqīmūn ṣ-ṣalāt w-mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يُؤمِنونَ بِما أُنزِلَ إِلَيكَ وَما أُنزِلَ مِن قَبلِكَ وَبِالآخِرَةِ هُم يوقِنونَ
blank: w-lladhīn yuʾminūn b-mā ʾunzil ʾilayk w-mā ʾunzil m qablik w-b-l-ʾākhirat hum yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, O Muhammad, and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ عَلىٰ هُدًى مِن رَبِّهِم ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: ʾulāʾik ʿalā hudam-m rabbihim w-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are upon right guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا سَواءٌ عَلَيهِم أَأَنذَرتَهُم أَم لَم تُنذِرهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū sawāʾ ʿalayhim ʾ-ʾandhartahum ʾam lam tundhirhum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieve - it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe

arabic_uthmani: خَتَمَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم وَعَلىٰ سَمعِهِم ۖ وَعَلىٰ أَبصارِهِم غِشاوَةٌ ۖ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: khatam llāh ʿalā qulūbihim w-ʿalā samʿihim w-ʿalā ʾabṣārihim ghishāwat w-lahum ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah has set a seal upon their hearts and upon their hearing, and over their vision is a veil. And for them is a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يَقولُ آمَنّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِاليَومِ الآخِرِ وَما هُم بِمُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-min n-nās m yaqūl ʾāmannā b-llāh w-b-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-mā hum b-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah and the Last Day," but they are not believers

arabic_uthmani: يُخادِعونَ اللَّهَ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَما يَخدَعونَ إِلّا أَنفُسَهُم وَما يَشعُرونَ
blank: yukhādiʿūn llāh w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-m yakhdaʿūn ʾillā ʾanfusahum w-mā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: They think to deceive Allah and those who believe, but they deceive not except themselves and perceive it not

arabic_uthmani: في قُلوبِهِم مَرَضٌ فَزادَهُمُ اللَّهُ مَرَضًا ۖ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ بِما كانوا يَكذِبونَ
blank: fī qulūbihim maraḍ f-zādahum llāh maraḍ w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm b-mā kānū yakdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: In their hearts is disease, so Allah has increased their disease; and for them is a painful punishment because they habitually used to lie

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُم لا تُفسِدوا فِي الأَرضِ قالوا إِنَّما نَحنُ مُصلِحونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum lā tufsidū fīl-ʾarḍ qālū ʾinnamā naḥn mu muṣliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "Do not cause corruption on the earth," they say, "We are but reformers

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّهُم هُمُ المُفسِدونَ وَلٰكِن لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinnahum humul-mufsidūn w-lāk lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, it is they who are the corrupters, but they perceive it not

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُم آمِنوا كَما آمَنَ النّاسُ قالوا أَنُؤمِنُ كَما آمَنَ السُّفَهاءُ ۗ أَلا إِنَّهُم هُمُ السُّفَهاءُ وَلٰكِن لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum ʾāminū k-mā ʾāman n-nās qālū ʾ-nuʾmin k-mā ʾāman s-sufahāʾ ʾ-lā ʾinnahum hum s-sufahāʾ w-lāk lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "Believe as the people have believed," they say, "Should we believe as the foolish have believed?" Unquestionably, it is they who are the foolish, but they know it not

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا لَقُوا الَّذينَ آمَنوا قالوا آمَنّا وَإِذا خَلَوا إِلىٰ شَياطينِهِم قالوا إِنّا مَعَكُم إِنَّما نَحنُ مُستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā laqūlladhīn ʾāmanū qālū ʾāmannā w-ʾidhā khalaw ʾilā shayāṭīnihim qālū ʾinnā maʿakum ʾinnamā naḥn mustahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they meet those who believe, they say, "We believe"; but when they are alone with their evil ones, they say, "Indeed, we are with you; we were only mockers

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ يَستَهزِئُ بِهِم وَيَمُدُّهُم في طُغيانِهِم يَعمَهونَ
blank: allāh yastahziʾ bihim w-yamudduhum fī ṭughyānihim yaʿmahūn
english_saheeh_international: But Allah mocks them and prolongs them in their transgression while they wander blindly

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ اشتَرَوُا الضَّلالَةَ بِالهُدىٰ فَما رَبِحَت تِجارَتُهُم وَما كانوا مُهتَدينَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn shtaraw ḍ-ḍalālat b-l-hudā f-mā rabiḥat tijāratuhum w-mā kānū muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones who have purchased error in exchange for guidance, so their transaction has brought no profit, nor were they guided

arabic_uthmani: مَثَلُهُم كَمَثَلِ الَّذِي استَوقَدَ نارًا فَلَمّا أَضاءَت ما حَولَهُ ذَهَبَ اللَّهُ بِنورِهِم وَتَرَكَهُم في ظُلُماتٍ لا يُبصِرونَ
blank: mathaluhum k-mathalilladhī stawqad nār f-lammā ʾaḍāʾat mā ḥawlahū dhahab llāh b-nūrihim w-tarakahum fī ẓulumāt lā yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: Their example is that of one who kindled a fire, but when it illuminated what was around him, Allah took away their light and left them in darkness so they could not see

arabic_uthmani: صُمٌّ بُكمٌ عُميٌ فَهُم لا يَرجِعونَ
blank: ṣumm bukm ʿumy f-hum lā yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Deaf, dumb and blind - so they will not return to the right path

arabic_uthmani: أَو كَصَيِّبٍ مِنَ السَّماءِ فيهِ ظُلُماتٌ وَرَعدٌ وَبَرقٌ يَجعَلونَ أَصابِعَهُم في آذانِهِم مِنَ الصَّواعِقِ حَذَرَ المَوتِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ مُحيطٌ بِالكافِرينَ
blank: ʾaw k-ṣayyib min s-samāʾ fīh ẓ-ẓulumāt w-raʿd w-barq yajʿalūn ʾaṣābiʿahum fī ʾādhānihim min ṣ-ṣawāʿiq ḥadharal-mawt w-llāh muḥīṭ b-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Or it is like a rainstorm from the sky within which is darkness, thunder and lightning. They put their fingers in their ears against the thunderclaps in dread of death. But Allah is encompassing of the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: يَكادُ البَرقُ يَخطَفُ أَبصارَهُم ۖ كُلَّما أَضاءَ لَهُم مَشَوا فيهِ وَإِذا أَظلَمَ عَلَيهِم قاموا ۚ وَلَو شاءَ اللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمعِهِم وَأَبصارِهِم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: yakādul-barq yakhṭaf ʾabṣārahum kullamā ʾaḍāʾ lahum mashaw fīh w-ʾidhā ʾaẓlam ʿalayhim qāmū w-law shāʾ llāh l-dhahab b-samʿihim w-ʾabṣārihim ʾinn llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: The lightning almost snatches away their sight. Every time it lights the way for them, they walk therein; but when darkness comes over them, they stand still. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ اعبُدوا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذي خَلَقَكُم وَالَّذينَ مِن قَبلِكُم لَعَلَّكُم تَتَّقونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʿbudū rabbakumulladhī khalaqakum w-lladhīn m qablikum laʿallakum tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الأَرضَ فِراشًا وَالسَّماءَ بِناءً وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَخرَجَ بِهِ مِنَ الثَّمَراتِ رِزقًا لَكُم ۖ فَلا تَجعَلوا لِلَّهِ أَندادًا وَأَنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: alladhī jaʿal lakumul-ʾarḍ firāsh w-s-samāʾ bināʾ w-ʾanzal min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾakhraj bihī min th-thamarāt rizq lakum f-lā tajʿalū l-llāh ʾandād w-ʾantum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: He who made for you the earth a bed spread out and the sky a ceiling and sent down from the sky, rain and brought forth thereby fruits as provision for you. So do not attribute to Allah equals while you know that there is nothing similar to Him

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كُنتُم في رَيبٍ مِمّا نَزَّلنا عَلىٰ عَبدِنا فَأتوا بِسورَةٍ مِن مِثلِهِ وَادعوا شُهَداءَكُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-ʾ kuntum fī rayb mimmā nazzalnā ʿalā ʿabdinā f-ʾtū b-sūrat m mithlihī w-dʿū shuhadāʾakum m dūn llāh ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And if you are in doubt about what We have sent down upon Our Servant Muhammad, then produce a surah the like thereof and call upon your witnesses other than Allah, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن لَم تَفعَلوا وَلَن تَفعَلوا فَاتَّقُوا النّارَ الَّتي وَقودُهَا النّاسُ وَالحِجارَةُ ۖ أُعِدَّت لِلكافِرينَ
blank: f-ʾ lam tafʿalū w-l tafʿalū f-ttaqū n-nār llatī waqūduhā n-nās w-l-ḥijārat ʾuʿiddat l-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: But if you do not - and you will never be able to - then fear the Fire, whose fuel is men and stones, prepared for the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَبَشِّرِ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ أَنَّ لَهُم جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ ۖ كُلَّما رُزِقوا مِنها مِن ثَمَرَةٍ رِزقًا ۙ قالوا هٰذَا الَّذي رُزِقنا مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَأُتوا بِهِ مُتَشابِهًا ۖ وَلَهُم فيها أَزواجٌ مُطَهَّرَةٌ ۖ وَهُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: w-bashshirilladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt ʾann lahum jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār kullamā ruziqū minhā m thamarat rizq qālū hādhālladhī ruziqnā m qabl w-ʾutū bihī mutashābih w-lahum fīhā ʾazwāj muṭahharat w-hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens in Paradise beneath which rivers flow. Whenever they are provided with a provision of fruit therefrom, they will say, "This is what we were provided with before." And it is given to them in likeness. And they will have therein purified spouses, and they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَستَحيي أَن يَضرِبَ مَثَلًا ما بَعوضَةً فَما فَوقَها ۚ فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا فَيَعلَمونَ أَنَّهُ الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّهِم ۖ وَأَمَّا الَّذينَ كَفَروا فَيَقولونَ ماذا أَرادَ اللَّهُ بِهٰذا مَثَلًا ۘ يُضِلُّ بِهِ كَثيرًا وَيَهدي بِهِ كَثيرًا ۚ وَما يُضِلُّ بِهِ إِلَّا الفاسِقينَ
blank: ʾinn llāh lā yastaḥyī ʾ yaḍrib mathalam-mā baʿūḍat f-mā fawqahā f-ʾammālladhīn ʾāmanū f-yaʿlamūn ʾannahul-ḥaqq m rabbihim w-ʾammālladhīn kafarū f-yaqūlūn mādhā ʾarād llāh b-hādhā mathal yuḍill bihī kathīr w-yahdī bihī kathīr w-mā yuḍill bihī ʾillāl-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah is not timid to present an example - that of a mosquito or what is smaller than it. And those who have believed know that it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they say, "What did Allah intend by this as an example?" He misleads many thereby and guides many thereby. And He misleads not except the defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَنقُضونَ عَهدَ اللَّهِ مِن بَعدِ ميثاقِهِ وَيَقطَعونَ ما أَمَرَ اللَّهُ بِهِ أَن يوصَلَ وَيُفسِدونَ فِي الأَرضِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: alladhīn yanquḍūn ʿahd llāh m baʿd mīthāqihī w-yaqṭaʿūn mā ʾamar llāh bihī ʾ yūṣal w-yufsidūn fīl-ʾarḍ ʾulāʾik humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: Who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined and cause corruption on earth. It is those who are the losers

arabic_uthmani: كَيفَ تَكفُرونَ بِاللَّهِ وَكُنتُم أَمواتًا فَأَحياكُم ۖ ثُمَّ يُميتُكُم ثُمَّ يُحييكُم ثُمَّ إِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: kayf takfurūn b-llāh w-kuntum ʾamwāt f-ʾaḥyākum thumm yumītukum thumm yuḥyīkum thumm ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: How can you disbelieve in Allah when you were lifeless and He brought you to life; then He will cause you to die, then He will bring you back to life, and then to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَ لَكُم ما فِي الأَرضِ جَميعًا ثُمَّ استَوىٰ إِلَى السَّماءِ فَسَوّاهُنَّ سَبعَ سَماواتٍ ۚ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: huwalladhī khalaq lakum mā fīl-ʾarḍ jamīʿ thumm stawā ʾilā s-samāʾ f-sawwāhunn sabʿ samāwāt w-huw b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: It is He who created for you all of that which is on the earth. Then He directed Himself to the heaven, His being above all creation, and made them seven heavens, and He is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ رَبُّكَ لِلمَلائِكَةِ إِنّي جاعِلٌ فِي الأَرضِ خَليفَةً ۖ قالوا أَتَجعَلُ فيها مَن يُفسِدُ فيها وَيَسفِكُ الدِّماءَ وَنَحنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ ۖ قالَ إِنّي أَعلَمُ ما لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl rabbuk l-l-malāʾikat ʾinnī jāʿil fīl-ʾarḍ khalīfat qālū ʾ-tajʿal fīhā m yufsid fīhā w-yasfik d-dimāʾ w-naḥn nusabbiḥ b-ḥamdik w-nuqaddis lak qāl ʾinnī ʾaʿlam mā lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority." They said, "Will You place upon it one who causes corruption therein and sheds blood, while we declare Your praise and sanctify You?" Allah said, "Indeed, I know that which you do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَعَلَّمَ آدَمَ الأَسماءَ كُلَّها ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُم عَلَى المَلائِكَةِ فَقالَ أَنبِئوني بِأَسماءِ هٰؤُلاءِ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-ʿallam ʾādamal-ʾasmāʾ kullahā thumm ʿaraḍahum ʿalāl-malāʾikat f-qāl ʾanbiʾūnī b-ʾasmāʾ hāʾulāʾ ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And He taught Adam the names - all of them. Then He showed them to the angels and said, "Inform Me of the names of these, if you are truthful

arabic_uthmani: قالوا سُبحانَكَ لا عِلمَ لَنا إِلّا ما عَلَّمتَنا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ العَليمُ الحَكيمُ
blank: qālū subḥānak lā ʿilm lanā ʾillā mā ʿallamtanā ʾinnak ʾantal-ʿalīmul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Exalted are You; we have no knowledge except what You have taught us. Indeed, it is You who is the Knowing, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا آدَمُ أَنبِئهُم بِأَسمائِهِم ۖ فَلَمّا أَنبَأَهُم بِأَسمائِهِم قالَ أَلَم أَقُل لَكُم إِنّي أَعلَمُ غَيبَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَأَعلَمُ ما تُبدونَ وَما كُنتُم تَكتُمونَ
blank: qāl yā-ʾādam ʾanbiʾhum b-ʾasmāʾihim f-lammā ʾanbaʾahum b-ʾasmāʾihim qāl ʾ-lam ʾaqul lakum ʾinnī ʾaʿlam ghayb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-ʾaʿlam mā tubdūn w-mā kuntum taktumūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O Adam, inform them of their names." And when he had informed them of their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the unseen aspects of the heavens and the earth? And I know what you reveal and what you have concealed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قُلنا لِلمَلائِكَةِ اسجُدوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدوا إِلّا إِبليسَ أَبىٰ وَاستَكبَرَ وَكانَ مِنَ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-ʾidh qulnā l-l-malāʾikat sjudū l-ʾādam f-sajadū ʾillā ʾiblīs ʾabā w-stakbar w-kān minal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when We said to the angels, "Prostrate before Adam"; so they prostrated, except for Iblees. He refused and was arrogant and became of the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَقُلنا يا آدَمُ اسكُن أَنتَ وَزَوجُكَ الجَنَّةَ وَكُلا مِنها رَغَدًا حَيثُ شِئتُما وَلا تَقرَبا هٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكونا مِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-qulnā yā-ʾādam skun ʾant w-zawjukal-jannat w-kulā minhā raghad ḥayth shiʾtumā w-lā taqrabā hādhih sh-shajarat f-takūnā min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We said, "O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise and eat therefrom in ease and abundance from wherever you will. But do not approach this tree, lest you be among the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَأَزَلَّهُمَا الشَّيطانُ عَنها فَأَخرَجَهُما مِمّا كانا فيهِ ۖ وَقُلنَا اهبِطوا بَعضُكُم لِبَعضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُم فِي الأَرضِ مُستَقَرٌّ وَمَتاعٌ إِلىٰ حينٍ
blank: f-ʾazallahumā sh-shayṭān ʿanhā f-ʾakhrajahumā mimmā kānā fīh w-qulnā hbiṭū baʿḍukum l-baʿḍ ʿaduww w-lakum fīl-ʾarḍ mustaqarr w-matāʿ ʾilā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: But Satan caused them to slip out of it and removed them from that condition in which they had been. And We said, "Go down, all of you, as enemies to one another, and you will have upon the earth a place of settlement and provision for a time

arabic_uthmani: فَتَلَقّىٰ آدَمُ مِن رَبِّهِ كَلِماتٍ فَتابَ عَلَيهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوّابُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: f-talaqqā ʾādam m rabbihī kalimāt f-tāb ʿalayh ʾinnahū huw t-tawwāb r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Then Adam received from his Lord some words, and He accepted his repentance. Indeed, it is He who is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: قُلنَا اهبِطوا مِنها جَميعًا ۖ فَإِمّا يَأتِيَنَّكُم مِنّي هُدًى فَمَن تَبِعَ هُدايَ فَلا خَوفٌ عَلَيهِم وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: qulnā hbiṭū minhā jamīʿ f-ʾimmā yaʾtiyannakum minnī hud f-m tabiʿ hudāy f-lā khawf ʿalayhim w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: We said, "Go down from it, all of you. And when guidance comes to you from Me, whoever follows My guidance - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا وَكَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ النّارِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: w-lladhīn kafarū w-kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥāb n-nār hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve deny Our signs - those will be companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: يا بَني إِسرائيلَ اذكُروا نِعمَتِيَ الَّتي أَنعَمتُ عَلَيكُم وَأَوفوا بِعَهدي أوفِ بِعَهدِكُم وَإِيّايَ فَارهَبونِ
blank: yā-banī ʾisrāʾīl dhkurū niʿmatiy llatī ʾanʿamt ʿalaykum w-ʾawfū b-ʿahdī ʾūf b-ʿahdikum w-ʾiyyāy f-rhabūn
english_saheeh_international: O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I have bestowed upon you and fulfill My covenant upon you that I will fulfill your covenant from Me, and be afraid of only Me

arabic_uthmani: وَآمِنوا بِما أَنزَلتُ مُصَدِّقًا لِما مَعَكُم وَلا تَكونوا أَوَّلَ كافِرٍ بِهِ ۖ وَلا تَشتَروا بِآياتي ثَمَنًا قَليلًا وَإِيّايَ فَاتَّقونِ
blank: w-ʾāminū b-mā ʾanzalt muṣaddiq l-mā maʿakum w-lā takūnū ʾawwal kāfir bihī w-lā tashtarū b-ʾāyātī thaman qalīl w-ʾiyyāy f-ttaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And believe in what I have sent down confirming that which is already with you, and be not the first to disbelieve in it. And do not exchange My signs for a small price, and fear only Me

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَلبِسُوا الحَقَّ بِالباطِلِ وَتَكتُمُوا الحَقَّ وَأَنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-lā talbisūl-ḥaqq b-l-bāṭil w-taktumūl-ḥaqq w-ʾantum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not mix the truth with falsehood or conceal the truth while you know it

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكاةَ وَاركَعوا مَعَ الرّاكِعينَ
blank: w-ʾaqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātū z-zakāt w-rkaʿū maʿ r-rākiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow in worship and obedience

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَتَأمُرونَ النّاسَ بِالبِرِّ وَتَنسَونَ أَنفُسَكُم وَأَنتُم تَتلونَ الكِتابَ ۚ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: ʾ-taʾmurūn n-nās b-l-birr w-tansawn ʾanfusakum w-ʾantum tatlūnal-kitāb ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Do you order righteousness of the people and forget yourselves while you recite the Scripture? Then will you not reason

arabic_uthmani: وَاستَعينوا بِالصَّبرِ وَالصَّلاةِ ۚ وَإِنَّها لَكَبيرَةٌ إِلّا عَلَى الخاشِعينَ
blank: w-staʿīnū b-ṣ-ṣabr w-ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾinnahā l-kabīrat ʾillā ʿalāl-khāshiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And seek help through patience and prayer, and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive to Allah

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَظُنّونَ أَنَّهُم مُلاقو رَبِّهِم وَأَنَّهُم إِلَيهِ راجِعونَ
blank: alladhīn yaẓunnūn ʾannahum mulāqū rabbihim w-ʾannahum ʾilayh rājiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Who are certain that they will meet their Lord and that they will return to Him

arabic_uthmani: يا بَني إِسرائيلَ اذكُروا نِعمَتِيَ الَّتي أَنعَمتُ عَلَيكُم وَأَنّي فَضَّلتُكُم عَلَى العالَمينَ
blank: yā-banī ʾisrāʾīl dhkurū niʿmatiy llatī ʾanʿamt ʿalaykum w-ʾannī faḍḍaltukum ʿalāl-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: O Children of Israel, remember My favor that I have bestowed upon you and that I preferred you over the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّقوا يَومًا لا تَجزي نَفسٌ عَن نَفسٍ شَيئًا وَلا يُقبَلُ مِنها شَفاعَةٌ وَلا يُؤخَذُ مِنها عَدلٌ وَلا هُم يُنصَرونَ
blank: w-ttaqū yawm lā tajzī nafs ʿ nafs shayʾ w-lā yuqbal minhā shafāʿat w-lā yuʾkhadh minhā ʿadl w-lā hum yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: And fear a Day when no soul will suffice for another soul at all, nor will intercession be accepted from it, nor will compensation be taken from it, nor will they be aided

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ نَجَّيناكُم مِن آلِ فِرعَونَ يَسومونَكُم سوءَ العَذابِ يُذَبِّحونَ أَبناءَكُم وَيَستَحيونَ نِساءَكُم ۚ وَفي ذٰلِكُم بَلاءٌ مِن رَبِّكُم عَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidh najjaynākum m ʾāl firʿawn yasūmūnakum sūʾal-ʿadhāb yudhabbiḥūn ʾabnāʾakum w-yastaḥyūn nisāʾakum w-fī dhālikum balāʾ m rabbikum ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And recall when We saved your forefathers from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with the worst torment, slaughtering your newborn sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ فَرَقنا بِكُمُ البَحرَ فَأَنجَيناكُم وَأَغرَقنا آلَ فِرعَونَ وَأَنتُم تَنظُرونَ
blank: w-ʾidh faraqnā bikumul-baḥr f-ʾanjaynākum w-ʾaghraqnā ʾāl firʿawn w-ʾantum tanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: And recall when We parted the sea for you and saved you and drowned the people of Pharaoh while you were looking on

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ واعَدنا موسىٰ أَربَعينَ لَيلَةً ثُمَّ اتَّخَذتُمُ العِجلَ مِن بَعدِهِ وَأَنتُم ظالِمونَ
blank: w-ʾidh wāʿadnā mūsā ʾarbaʿīn laylat thumm ttakhadhtumul-ʿijl m baʿdihī w-ʾantum ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And recall when We made an appointment with Moses for forty nights. Then you took for worship the calf after him, while you were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ عَفَونا عَنكُم مِن بَعدِ ذٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: thumm ʿafawnā ʿankum m baʿd dhālik laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: Then We forgave you after that so perhaps you would be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ آتَينا موسَى الكِتابَ وَالفُرقانَ لَعَلَّكُم تَهتَدونَ
blank: w-ʾidh ʾātaynā mūsāl-kitāb w-l-furqān laʿallakum tahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And recall when We gave Moses the Scripture and criterion that perhaps you would be guided

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ موسىٰ لِقَومِهِ يا قَومِ إِنَّكُم ظَلَمتُم أَنفُسَكُم بِاتِّخاذِكُمُ العِجلَ فَتوبوا إِلىٰ بارِئِكُم فَاقتُلوا أَنفُسَكُم ذٰلِكُم خَيرٌ لَكُم عِندَ بارِئِكُم فَتابَ عَلَيكُم ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوّابُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl mūsā l-qawmihī yā-qawm ʾinnakum ẓalamtum ʾanfusakum b-ttikhādhikumul-ʿijl f-tūbū ʾilā bāriʾikum f-qtulū ʾanfusakum dhālikum khayr lakum ʿind bāriʾikum f-tāb ʿalaykum ʾinnahū huw t-tawwāb r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And recall when Moses said to his people, "O my people, indeed you have wronged yourselves by your taking of the calf for worship. So repent to your Creator and kill yourselves. That is best for all of you in the sight of your Creator." Then He accepted your repentance; indeed, He is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قُلتُم يا موسىٰ لَن نُؤمِنَ لَكَ حَتّىٰ نَرَى اللَّهَ جَهرَةً فَأَخَذَتكُمُ الصّاعِقَةُ وَأَنتُم تَنظُرونَ
blank: w-ʾidh qultum yā-mūsā l nuʾmin lak ḥattā narā llāh jahrat f-ʾakhadhatkum ṣ-ṣāʿiqat w-ʾantum tanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: And recall when you said, "O Moses, we will never believe you until we see Allah outright"; so the thunderbolt took you while you were looking on

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ بَعَثناكُم مِن بَعدِ مَوتِكُم لَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: thumm baʿathnākum m baʿd mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: Then We revived you after your death that perhaps you would be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَظَلَّلنا عَلَيكُمُ الغَمامَ وَأَنزَلنا عَلَيكُمُ المَنَّ وَالسَّلوىٰ ۖ كُلوا مِن طَيِّباتِ ما رَزَقناكُم ۖ وَما ظَلَمونا وَلٰكِن كانوا أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: w-ẓallalnā ʿalaykumul-ghamām w-ʾanzalnā ʿalaykumul-mann w-s-salwā kulū m ṭayyibātimā razaqnākum w-mā ẓalamūnā w-lāk kānū ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: And We shaded you with clouds and sent down to you manna and quails, saying, "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you." And they wronged Us not - but they were only wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قُلنَا ادخُلوا هٰذِهِ القَريَةَ فَكُلوا مِنها حَيثُ شِئتُم رَغَدًا وَادخُلُوا البابَ سُجَّدًا وَقولوا حِطَّةٌ نَغفِر لَكُم خَطاياكُم ۚ وَسَنَزيدُ المُحسِنينَ
blank: w-ʾidh qulnā dkhulū hādhihil-qaryat f-kulū minhā ḥayth shiʾtum raghad w-dkhulūl-bāb sujjad w-qūlū ḥiṭṭat naghfir lakum khaṭāyākum w-s-nazīdul-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: And recall when We said, "Enter this city and eat from it wherever you will in ease and abundance, and enter the gate bowing humbly and say, 'Relieve us of our burdens.' We will then forgive your sins for you, and We will increase the doers of good in goodness and reward

arabic_uthmani: فَبَدَّلَ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا قَولًا غَيرَ الَّذي قيلَ لَهُم فَأَنزَلنا عَلَى الَّذينَ ظَلَموا رِجزًا مِنَ السَّماءِ بِما كانوا يَفسُقونَ
blank: f-baddalalladhīn ẓalamū qawl ghayralladhī qīl lahum f-ʾanzalnā ʿalālladhīn ẓalamū rijzam-min s-samāʾ b-mā kānū yafsuqūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who wronged changed those words to a statement other than that which had been said to them, so We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِذِ استَسقىٰ موسىٰ لِقَومِهِ فَقُلنَا اضرِب بِعَصاكَ الحَجَرَ ۖ فَانفَجَرَت مِنهُ اثنَتا عَشرَةَ عَينًا ۖ قَد عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُناسٍ مَشرَبَهُم ۖ كُلوا وَاشرَبوا مِن رِزقِ اللَّهِ وَلا تَعثَوا فِي الأَرضِ مُفسِدينَ
blank: w-ʾidh stasqā mūsā l-qawmihī f-qulnā ḍrib b-ʿaṣākal-ḥajar f-nfajarat minh thnatā ʿashrat ʿayn qad ʿalim kull ʾunās mashrabahum kulū w-shrabū m rizq llāh w-lā taʿthaw fīl-ʾarḍ mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And recall when Moses prayed for water for his people, so We said, "Strike with your staff the stone." And there gushed forth from it twelve springs, and every people knew its watering place. "Eat and drink from the provision of Allah, and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قُلتُم يا موسىٰ لَن نَصبِرَ عَلىٰ طَعامٍ واحِدٍ فَادعُ لَنا رَبَّكَ يُخرِج لَنا مِمّا تُنبِتُ الأَرضُ مِن بَقلِها وَقِثّائِها وَفومِها وَعَدَسِها وَبَصَلِها ۖ قالَ أَتَستَبدِلونَ الَّذي هُوَ أَدنىٰ بِالَّذي هُوَ خَيرٌ ۚ اهبِطوا مِصرًا فَإِنَّ لَكُم ما سَأَلتُم ۗ وَضُرِبَت عَلَيهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ وَالمَسكَنَةُ وَباءوا بِغَضَبٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ ۗ ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم كانوا يَكفُرونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقتُلونَ النَّبِيّينَ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ ۗ ذٰلِكَ بِما عَصَوا وَكانوا يَعتَدونَ

english_saheeh_international: And recall when We took your covenant, saying, "Do not shed each other's blood or evict one another from your homes." Then you acknowledged this while you were witnessing
